about.title: About me
about.description1: I am a web developer with a particular passion for clarity and user-friendliness. I love to come up with and implement new ideas within an internally coherent package. I am a tenacious problem-solver, and my workflow makes distinct use of intuition - both my own and the users'.
about.description2: I have always enjoyed technology and creative and analytical work on websites. Having turned my dream into a solid knowledge base and a career, I am continually eager to learn more and expand my skills.

references.title: References
references.subtitle: Here is what my colleagues say about me
references.text1: Joshua always wanted to understand how everything fits together, not just follow tutorials step by step. He brought clarity to our frontend code and had a great instinct for what really matters in a project.
references.text2: Joshua has a strong sense of direction — he sees where things are going and helps guide the team toward it. He’s always focused, asks smart questions, and pushes for meaningful solutions rather than quick fixes.
references.text3: Joshua was always kind and easy to work with. He has a real talent for explaining things clearly, even to someone like me who’s not from a tech background. He made our group feel like a team.
